AODCore.image

Contains basic image handling that the entirety of AOD uses. From here you can either load an image or pass a loaded image, referred to as either a SheetContainer or SheetRect, to various functions. Another way to look at these two image containers is as a spritesheet and individual sprite.

struct SheetContainer;
Contains basic information of an image.

GLuint texture;


int width;


int height;


this(GLuint t, int w, int h);


this(string filename);


T opCast(T)() if (is(T == SheetRect));
Casts the sheetcontainer to a sheetrect (of the entire image)

struct SheetRect;
A sheetcontainer that contains the coordinates of a subsection of the image. Useful for spritesheets, image cropping, etc.

Vector ul;


Vector lr;


this(SheetContainer sc, Vector _ul, Vector _lr);
Creates sheet rect

Params:
SheetContainer sc SheetContainer to use as image
Vector _ul relative offset for the upper left coordinate from origin {0, 0}
Vector _lr relative offset of the lower right coordinate from origin {0, 0}

this(SheetContainer sc, int ix, int iy, int width, int height);
Constructs sheet rect with a sheet container
